stories.Title: Beware of AI pollution!
stories.Description: As AI trains on machine-generated data, researchers uncover a concerning truth: irreversible defects can emerge. Human knowledge remains essential for maintaining response quality and variety.
stories.Tweet: Beware of AI pollution! 📦 As AI trains on machine-generated data, researchers uncover a concerning truth: irreversible defects can emerge. Human knowledge remains essential for maintaining response quality and variety. #ai https://venturebeat.com/ai/the-ai-feedback-loop-researchers-warn-of-model-collapse-as-ai-trains-on-ai-generated-content/

stories.Title: Safety comes first for the UK
stories.Description: In the pursuit of more responsible AI development, OpenAI, Google DeepMind, and Anthropic are collaborating with the UK government by granting early access to their AI models for research purposes.
stories.Tweet: Safety comes first for the UK 📦 In the pursuit of more responsible AI development, OpenAI, Google DeepMind, and Anthropic are collaborating with the UK government by granting early access to their AI models for research purposes. #ai https://techcrunch.com/2023/06/12/uk-ai-safety-research-pledge/

stories.Title: Salesforce unveils AI solutions for enterprises
stories.Description: AI Cloud is an open platform designed to transform business operations. With AI-powered insights and automated workflows, enterprises can create more meaningful connections with their audiences.

stories.Title: A more powerful Search with AI
stories.Description: Google's experimental search engine uses generative AI to synthesize answers from multiple sources, providing a more intuitive and informative experience.
stories.Tweet: A more powerful Search with AI 📦 Google's experimental search engine uses generative AI to synthesize answers from multiple sources, providing a more intuitive and informative experience. #google https://www.cnet.com/tech/services-and-software/googles-new-ai-search-slick-summaries-but-requires-fact-checks/

stories.Title: NACS: On the path to standardization
stories.Description: Tesla's connector is gaining traction as the preferred choice for electric vehicle charging. With GM and Ford on board, it's set to become the new industry standard.

stories.Title: Retail therapy with Tesla

stories.Title: Vision Pro: Budget edition
stories.Description: Mark Gurman suggests that "Apple Vision One" or "Apple Vision" will come with a lower-quality screen and a simpler headband design by 2025 as a more affordable alternative.

stories.Title: Innovation in heating
stories.Description: Finnish startup, The Warming Surfaces Company, introduces "Halia" a heating technology that transforms furniture and walls into energy-efficient radiant heaters.

stories.Title: The Reddit revolution
